original_title: A Different Approach to EV Conversions
original_content:
While there are a lot of exciting electric vehicles finally coming to market, many of us feel nostalgic for the fossil cars of our youth. [Mihir Vardhan] restored his grandfathers car with an unusual gas-to-EV conversion.
While this conversion starts in the usual fashion by pulling out the gas engine, [Vardhan] takes a different tack than most by not just bolting an electric motor up to the transmission. Instead, he and his crew removed the head and pistons from the petrol burner and bolted the electric motor to the top on an L-shaped bracket. Using the timing belt to transfer power to the crankshaft, there is no need to figure out additional motors for the A/C compressor or power steering pump, greatly simplifying implementation.
[Vardhan] did need to add a vacuum pump for the braking system and used a DC/DC converter to step down the 72V traction battery voltage to the 12V needed to charge the accessory battery. While it doesnt exactly boast the performance of a Tesla, his bargain-basement conversion does yield a converted vehicle that can get around town for only around $3k US, even if it does mean your EV still needs oil changes. We think this could work even better on a vehicle with a timing chain instead of a belt, but its certainly an interesting way to go about the conversion process.
Weve covered our fondness for EV conversions in the past for cars, motorcycles, and boats if youd like to dig deeper. Have your own EV conversion you think we should cover? Send us a tip!
title: ガソリン車を電気自動車に変換する方法
body: [Mihir Vardhan]はガソリン車を電気自動車に変換しました。変換方法は通常と異なり、エンジンのヘッドとピストンを取り外し、電気モーターをトランスミッションの上部に取り付けました。ACコンプレッサーやパワーステアリングポンプに追加のモーターは不要で、実装が大幅に簡素化されました。変換費用は約3,000ドルで、街中を走ることができますが、オイル交換が必要です。
titles: ガソリン車を電気自動車に変換する方法
エンジンを取り外す代わりに、クランクシャフトに電気モーターを取り付けるハック
低予算で都市を走ることができる電気自動車を作る方法
タイミングベルトを使用してクランクシャフトに電力を転送することで、冷房コンプレッサーやパワーステアリングポンプを追加する必要がない
エンジンにDC/DCコンバーターと真空ポンプを追加することでEVの性能を向上させる方法
